G

Game - Class in hw2
This class encapsulates all the logic for a multi-player game of "Wheel of Fortune".
Game(String[]) - Constructor for class hw2.Game
Constructs a new game instance.
GameTextUI - Class in hw2
Text-based user interface for the WheelOfFortuneGame.
GameTextUI() - Constructor for class hw2.GameTextUI
 
GameUI - Class in gui
Graphical user interface for a wheel of fortune game.
getAnswer() - Method in class hw2.Game
Returns the complete hidden text (with all characters revealed).
getDisplay() - Method in class hw2.Game
Returns an array showing the characters of the hidden text to be displayed.
getDisplayedText() - Method in class hw2.HiddenText
Returns the displayed form of the hidden text, in which only the letters that have been identified by the update() method are revealed.
getGameBalance(int) - Method in class hw2.Game
Returns the total winnings for the given player.
getGameBalance() - Method in class hw2.Player
Returns the player's game balance (not including potential winnings from the current round).
getHiddenText() - Method in class hw2.HiddenText
Returns the actual hidden text stored in this object.
getName() - Method in class hw2.Player
Returns the player's name.
getNumPlayers() - Method in class hw2.Game
Returns the number of players in the game.
getPhrase(int) - Method in class hw2.PhraseList
Returns the nth phrase from the file, where the first line of the file is numbered zero.
getPlayerName(int) - Method in class hw2.Game
Returns the name of the given player.
getRotation() - Method in class hw2.Wheel
Returns the current rotation of the wheel.
getRoundBalance(int) - Method in class hw2.Game
Returns the potential winnings in this round for the given player.
getRoundBalance() - Method in class hw2.Player
Returns the player's round balance (potential winnings for the current round).
getSegmentValue() - Method in class hw2.Wheel
Returns the value for the segment at the wheel's current rotation.
getSize() - Method in class hw2.PhraseList
Returns the number of strings in this phrase list.
getWheelRotation() - Method in class hw2.Game
Returns the current rotation of the wheel for this game.
getWheelValue() - Method in class hw2.Game
Returns the current value on the wheel for this game.
go(String) - Method in class hw2.GameTextUI
Starts the UI.
guessConsonant(char) - Method in class hw2.Game
Checks whether the given consonant occurs in the hidden text, updates the displayed text accordingly, and adjusts the current player's balance by the number of occurrences times the wheel value.
guessPhrase(String) - Method in class hw2.Game
Checks whether the given string matches the hidden text (without regard to case).
